KitKat::

She followed her nose, staying downwind of the scent. Soon, after 
sneeking around the forest, she found the cause of the scent. She saw 
something that made her optics grow wide. She peered out from under a 
thick bush. Another wolf bot, playing with a robot and a small fox 
bot.  She rubbed her optics with her paws. Then refocused her optics 
and knew they were not decieved. She lay under the bush, her scent 
still down wind from them. SO they would not smell her. She watched 
the black wolf train a small child like fox. For a moment, her mind 
wandered into an old dream of wishing to see such things. Predacons 
never were alowed to enjoy such pleasures in life. Nor is a warrior 
allowed to have such things, it would give the enemy something to 
hold over the warrior. She let out a soft sigh and continued to watch 
in fascination.  She was about to leave her stomach once again acted 
up and she was forced to lay on the ground, under the bush. Panting 
hard and wishing the pain would just go away. In wolf mode, she lay 
there.
